mapper.select: select * from tbl_searchlog where keyword like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_searchlog (keyword, regdate, user) values (#{keyword}, #{regDate}, #{user})
mapper.select: select regdate from tbl_searchlog group by regdate order by regdate asc
select keyword from tbl_searchlog group by keyword
select sum(count) as count, keyword from tbl_searchlog group by regdate, keyword having regdate=#{regDate}
select count(regdate) as cdate, sum(count) as count, keyword, max(regdate) as lastdate from tbl_searchlog group by keyword, user having user=#{user} order by cdate desc
